title: Surfing Neanderthals
itunes:title: Surfing Neanderthals
description:
What do recent studies about surfer’s ear and neanderthals reveal about their relationship with the ocean? In this episode of Stuff to Blow Your Mind, Robert and Joe discuss the condition and some recent findings regarding the neanderthals.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
